babysitting_warning_engine.description: Predicts when prompts will require manual confirmation

high_confidence.message: 🚨 HIGH CONFIRMATION LIKELIHOOD: This prompt will definitely require manual confirmation
high_confidence.reason: Contains file creation, editing, or code generation operations

medium_confidence.message: ⚠️ MEDIUM CONFIRMATION LIKELIHOOD: This prompt will likely require manual confirmation
medium_confidence.reason: Contains operations that typically require confirmation
medium_confidence.suggestion: Be prepared to confirm with ⌘⮐ (Command + Enter)

low_confidence.message: 💡 LOW CONFIRMATION LIKELIHOOD: This prompt might require manual confirmation
low_confidence.reason: Contains some operations that could require confirmation

no_confidence.message: ✅ NO CONFIRMATION NEEDED: This prompt should work with YOLO Mode
no_confidence.reason: Contains only terminal commands and system operations
